I was told however, you can use older #wacom pro pen on #MobileStudioPro, but you won't get 8192 pressure levels, only 2048 levels.
Unfortunate they've changed the size of the nibs in the new Pro Pen 2. Old #wacom nibs won't fit new pen #MobileStudioPro
#MobileStudioPro does run a little warm. I imagine it had been on since the morning; I tried it in afternoon. It's not unbearable though
Tried out the @wacom @WacomANZ #MobileStudioPro today. Awesome drawing experience! Virtually no parallax & low latency — very smooth #Want!
Then I have my own crazy ideas to contend with. Sometimes I want to work up all cover concepts on an issue.
For another concept I'm looking at paying homage to a piece by another famous artist.
For my next cover layout I'm referencing a book of an artist's work, which I got in year 10 for a school art award.
@EricCanete the thick volumes are not a slog either, in fact I found it surprisingly fast paced in quite a few places
@EricCanete oh man, you've gotta make time to read Akira, it's essential reading! My fave manga alongside Lone Wolf & Cub.
@jonathanglapion 😂😂😂 huh-larious... because it's true!
@EricCanete I had to watch it 3 times back in the day. The manga is so much clearer. Otomo wasn't done with the manga when he made the anime

#Moana was fantastic! Probably one of my fave Disney movies. #InnerWorkings was also a great short! More like this please @Disney!
Not good to start the New Year with negatives, but I definitely had the worst meal of 2017 last night! At least the company was good.
Had flu over Christmas & New Year's but finally shaking it. Locked in a Moana sesh for tonight & planning on squeezing some drawing in too!
@AngryITMan @abcnews lol, I think that's just the lowest temperature in the state, not the location
@jordantboyd @JonSommariva I'd flat colour something like that lol
@JonSommariva @jordantboyd He draws quite a bit over the photos though to make them look more analogue. Maybe a bit more prevalent in manga.

@JonSommariva @jordantboyd I actually watched a video w/ Inio Asano using this technique in his work the other day:
https://t.co/DdFJWGIMrC
Not feeling very festive this Christmas;I've been sick since the 24th. I hope you all had a good one though & all the best for the new year!

@JonSommariva Bahahaha. The girls went and saw it, and the first thing they said to me, when they came home, was how fake it looked! LOL
Customer Service: if a customer asks seven times to speak to a manager... and you still haven't gone to get the manager #YouSuckAtYourJob
@nathanfairbairn haha mine is the same
@osyardo he loved it
@osyardo how did Isaac take it? It had a lot darker/adult tone than the other movies.
@osyardo yeah I liked him too. I kinda wished they'd just made him a Jedi though, but I guess that wouldn't have worked with continuity.
@osyardo I thought even a couple of vehicle shots were too clean/perfect; they looked more like models, than the models in the OG trilogy
@osyardo what'd you think of the cgi?
@TravisCharest Wacom's new Mobilestudio Pro & Cintiq Pro are supposed to have virtually no lag & no parallax. Gonna try one out this month.
@GeorgeM68340969 I would not object to giving him the rest of the Star Wars movies.
@GeorgeM68340969 Never saw that; I'm not a big Godzilla fan.
So many cool characters in #RogueOne& the acting was all on point too! The leads: Jyn Erso, Cassian Andor, K-2SO & Krennic were my def faves
But man, all the fight scenes & space battles looked so cool! #RogueOne nailed the overall #StarWars look/vibe too, more than Force Awakens.
My only real criticism of #RogueOne is they didn't avoid the #UncannyValley! Some CGI looked like video game cut scenes, others too perfect.
I felt they did a great job keeping the continuity in #RogueOne& even though you pretty much knew the ending it was still very engaging!
I felt #RogueOne definitely had a more adult/serious tone to it than the other Star Wars films. Most of the hardcore fans should love it tho
@axeman87 It's the closest in feel to original trilogy IMO.
#RogueOne was a pretty awesome prequel! #StarWars
@neilstucky1 probably when the book comes out, unless someone makes me a ridiculous offer prior
